title: President Rajapaksa visits Naga Vihara in Jaffna
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) President Mahinda Rajapaksa paid a visit to Naga Vihara, the historic Buddhist Shrine at Jaffna town yesterday on 1st of April. Venerable Maha Sanga headed by Chief Incumbent of the Naga Vihara Ven. Meegahajathure Gnanarathana Nayaka Thero invoked blessings on President Rajapaksa after he…
